entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
